title: 1 BR Apt  1 block to MCAD, near UMN, MCTC
posting_body: ['Stevens Sq 1BR 1 Block to MCAD, walk to downtown on direct bus to UMN,', 'Property Address', '1912 3rd Ave So. |6, 35, 36 | Minneapolis, MN 55404', 'Available  Immediate, 8/1/, 9/1', 'Offered By', 'GISP, Inc.', '|', 'show contact info', 'Description', 'This  lovely corner one bedroom is around 420 square feet and hosts a remodeled kitchen with new frig, lots of cabinets, natural woodwork, hardwood floors, ceiling fan, and window blinds and updated appliances.', 'There are also a limited number of free storage lockers.', 'We require a $45.00 application fee per adult when applying.', 'Income must be 2.0 x the rent.', ' No Evictions or UD’s in the last 5 years.', 'No major credit accounts written off, delinquent, or in collections in last 5 years.', 'No felony convictions in the last five years or Misdemeanors in the last year.', ' Those with felonies for murder, rape, arson, or assault will be denied.', 'No major lease violations from previous Landlord references.', 'We accept first time renters and co-signers.', 'We will accept cats and dogs for additional fees and rent.', ' Breed restrictions apply.', ' Off street parking is  available for an additional charge $75 per month.', 'To apply go to <URL>', 'Units vary,', 'this is a nonsmoking building', 'Amenities', 'natural wood work', 'secured building entry system', '24 hour emergency service', 'One block to MCAD', 'Walking distance to shops and restaurants', 'laundry on site', 'on line rent payment', 'on line maintenance requests', 'On direct bus line to West Bank', 'free storage', 'surveillance cameras', 'Free storage lockers', 'Off street parking available', 'Close to MCTC', 'Hardwood floors', 'Details', 'Beds/Baths: 1BD/1.0BA', 'Square Feet: 420', 'Rental Terms', 'Rent starts at: $830.00', 'Available: 08/01/2022', 'Application Fee: $45.00', 'Security Deposit: $830.00', 'Pet Policy', 'Cats allowed', 'Dogs allowed']
